pr_title: [BEAM-10595] Remove rules that not work well with Java UDF

timeline.message: [BEAM-10595] Remove rules that not work well with Java UDF.

timeline.bodyText: It'd be helpful to specifically mention CalcMergeRule here.

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't we just disable these rules all together (in BeamRuleSets.java) if they are redundant instead of special casing them for ZetaSQL?
